title: 04/13/2021 - Hour 3 - Ryan Hollins on Jamal Murray's Torn ACL
itunes:title: 04/13/2021 - Hour 3 - Ryan Hollins on Jamal Murray's Torn ACL
description:
Jason Smith and Jason McIntyre are in for Dan Patrick and the Danettes, reacting live to the breaking news that Jamal Murray suffered a season ending torn ACL vs the Warriors. NBA Vet and Analyst Ryan Hollins joins the guys with the player perspective on load management and how the Nuggets can still salvage the season. Plus, the Cardinals sign FA RB James Conner leading the guys to wonder if Ben Roethlisberger can make it through the season without a running game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
